data.eml:eml: Marine Macrostomorpha (Platyhelminthes, Rhabditophora) from the Algarve (Southern Portugal)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schockaert, Ernest R. (2014): Marine Macrostomorpha (Platyhelminthes, Rhabditophora) from the Algarve (Southern Portugal). Zootaxa 3872 (5): 577-590, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3872.5.8
